name: Land of Tezrel
overview: You are in the mysterious land of Tezrel where you must find the magic ring of Vorda. You have both friends and enemies in Tezrel. On your journey you will find a number of objects. There are three creatures (a wizard, an old man and a dwarf) in the Land Of Tezrel. Some of the creatures will attack you and the dwarf may steal your sword. If the dwarf should steal your sword, he creates an illusion that the sword is elsewhere. Huw Ford (of HFS) was the author of the original Commodore 64 and Vic-20 versions. The BBC version of the game is credited to Gavin J. Cradle, and the Dragon 32 version to Anthony Mansell.
